      • deleteTempFiles

        public boolean deleteTempFiles(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc)
        Description copied from interface: TrainingMaster
        Attempt to delete any temporary files generated by this TrainingMaster. Depending on the configuration, no temporary files may be generated.
        Specified by:
        deleteTempFiles in interface TrainingMaster<R extends TrainingResult,W extends TrainingWorker<R>>
        Parameters:
        sc - JavaSparkContext (used to access HDFS etc file systems, when required)
        Returns:
        True if deletion was successful (or, no files to delete); false otherwise.
